name: abap2ui5-web
description: Development of UI5 Apps in pure ABAP. Follow this project on [twitter](https://twitter.com/OblomovDev) to keep up to date!

scripts.clone1: rm -rf abap2UI5 && git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/abap2UI5/abap2UI5 && cp -r abap2UI5/src src
scripts.clone2: rm -rf abap2UI5-samples && git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/abap2UI5/abap2UI5-samples && cp -r abap2UI5-samples/src src/samples
scripts.clone: rm -rf src && npm run clone1 && npm run clone2
scripts.downport: rm -rf downport && cp -r src downport && abaplint --fix abaplint-downport.jsonc
scripts.transpile: rm -rf output && cp test/*.abap downport && abap_transpile abap_transpile.json
scripts.unit: npm run downport && npm run transpile && node output/index.mjs
scripts.test: npm run downport && npm run transpile && npm run express
